trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Des Moines
There were no other sightings in Des Moines on or around April 30th 2004
Summary: Strange sound and could not move
divs: sighting detailsthe weather was nice so all the bedroom windows were open. it was april or may. it was before we had the air conditioner on. i was in bed alone awake and thinking about getting up to read or watch tv since i was not falling asleep. then heard what i though was a helicopter right over our house. it seemed to be staying in one place - then the sound changed. it got quieter but i knew it was still there. then another sound - an oscillating humming sound which had a steady increase in power. i thought that if a sound could actually pull you physically up - this sound could do that. i also wondered if our military was experimenting with the affects of sound. later - i do not know how much later - i was in kind of a fetal position on the bed. i was thinking that i can not move because if i moved it would know that i was there. i remember thinking that i was doing a good job of staying still because i even stopped blinking. i have never had such an experience and never felt anything strange in my room other than when my grandmother died and i felt that she visited me to tell me that she was ok. i later reasoned that was due to my extreme grief (i was 16 at the time). i only bother with that to say this is only the second "strange" experience that i have had and i am 62 years old. i was so sure that something happened that night, that i placed our digital camera and my mini tape recorder on the nightstand. they remained there for a good year after the event. i was determined to record proof the next time but there was no next time. it was months before i told my husband about this and i only told him because he wondered where the camera was. it did not cross my mind - until my husband suggested it - that perhaps i could not move and i just thought i was in control. he just reminded me (i just read this write up to him) that i also asked for a bigger\brighter flashlight for the backyard. i know about one feeling like they cannot move while awakening from a dream - not news to me. i have a degree in psychology and have read on that subject. for some reason i think about this event enough to wonder what the big deal is since it did not happen again and ok maybe it was just a dream.
